itunes:subtitle: The Drinkin' Bros asked for it, and Michael Rapaport listened. Ross Patterson goes live from New York with special guest Michael Rapaort as we chat about sports, acting, music, and life. His new book "This Book Has Balls" is on sale everywhere now and is...
itunes:summary:
The Drinkin' Bros asked for it, and Michael Rapaport listened. Ross Patterson goes live from New York with special guest Michael Rapaort as we chat about sports, acting, music, and life. His new book "This Book Has Balls" is on sale everywhere now and is one of the funniest of 2017. Check it out!

description:
The Drinkin' Bros asked for it, and Michael Rapaport listened. Ross Patterson goes live from New York with special guest Michael Rapaort as we chat about sports, acting, music, and life. His new book "This Book Has Balls" is on sale everywhere now and is one of the funniest of 2017. Check it out!
